<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Conrasu Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2787) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75), [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6), [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), and all [conrasu](/Traits.aspx?ID=343) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Conrasu Weapon Expertise
